item.title: Symfony + Aws Lambda Part2
item.description:
In the previous article, I have explained a basic guideline to deploy your Symfony application into AWS Lambda. Now it’s time to understand deeply how does it work

Symfony AWS Lambda Part 2

item.title: Symfony + AWS Lambda Part1
item.description:
Symfony is one of the most used frameworks in the PHP world. Nowadays talking about serverless is common, so it’s very important to know how to use Symfony with this technology. In the following article, I have described how to deploy a Symfony application to AWS Lambda using Bref. This is the first part, the second part will be posted very soon! Stay tuned!

Symfony AWS Lambda Part 1
